item.title: What is baseball?
item.description: Baseball is a bat-and-ball sport whose modern form originated in the United States in the nineteenth century. It is closely related to bat-and-ball sports of European origin, such as cricket.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
